title: AFS: Effectively Working With Military Linguists: Vital Intercultural Intermediaries
description: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews author  Remi M. Hajjar about his recent article, "Effectively Working With Military Linguists: Vital Intercultural Intermediaries."
content:encoded: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews author  Remi M. Hajjar about his recent article, "Effectively Working With Military Linguists: Vital Intercultural Intermediaries."
